title: Bill Cosby fights to block accusers’ testimony
text:
Bill Cosby fights to block accusers’ testimony 3:47am EST - 01:25 
Comedian Bill Cosby appeared in a Pennsylvania court on Monday for a hearing on whether to allow testimony at his retrial on sexual misconduct charges from 19 other women who have made similar accusations against him.   
Comedian Bill Cosby appeared in a Pennsylvania court on Monday for a hearing on whether to allow testimony at his retrial on sexual misconduct charges from 19 other women who have made similar accusations against him.  //reut.rs/2I6ksuc
